item.title: Building our Tiny House - Drain configuration
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PCMdZK1dSR8 Doc Zoidberg Published on Sep 1, 2014 Shows setup of piped drain connections inside tiny home structure, and below floor so that a city sewer connection can be used. Got a lot done this weekend, the weather was not a problem.
